name: Best Vatican B&B

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2006, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We stayed at Best Bed & Breakfast Vatican for two nights on our honeymoon. It was absolutely wonderful. The rooms were beautiful and clean, the food was fantastic, and the service of the staff was excellent. We loved the location ~ right off of a subway stop, and within a very short walking distance to the Vatican. We would recommend this B&B to anyone and will most definitely stay there the next time we are in Rome.
reviews.title: Fantastic Bed & Breakfast

reviews.text: We only stayed one night in Best B&B because they were fully booked for the other nights we were in Rome.
reviews.title: Simply the best
Just might be the best
reviews.text: I loved the place - very modern and chic. It looked great. We had a flat screen TV in our room complete with DVD player. There was a selection of DVDs in the reception that we could watch. There was also an adorable little bar fridge with the cheapest drinks we'd had in the whole of Italy.
Breakfast was just fantastic - served in your room on a huge tray. You even get to select what you would like: scambled eggs, salmon etc.
reviews.title: BB&B was the Best

reviews.text: Everything was perfect - except our aircon didn't work, which was a pitty because it was a rather hot night.
reviews.title: Fantastic find. Top class service. Would go back tomorrow!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We stayed in the Best B&B in June 06.
reviews.title: Pity about the Air-con

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I couldnt entirely agree with the rave reviews this property receives..here's how i'd sum up my stay.
reviews.title: Best Bed & Breakfast !!!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2006, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Positives:
reviews.title: Not the Best, only a OK B&B

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2006, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: It is a lovely modern, apartment styled B&B, with LCD TVs and very stylish fittings and furnishings..i didnt notice any tacky plastic furniture, as per a previous review.
reviews.title: Best Place to Stay In Rome

likes.liked: — Everything is new, clean, free internet, Dvds to borrow for in room, location, etc.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2006, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The 2 guys are really friendly and obliging when they are there.
reviews.title: Best vatican is a little gem

likes.disliked: — tiny elevator, my husband and i could just fit in but hey we are overweight

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2006, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I will not repeat the great comments of other reviews. This is a great place to stay. The management was very helpful and was always available. The rooms are spotless and very functional. The breakfast is outstanding.
reviews.title: Outstanding B and B

likes.liked: — Location,value, condition of property and great staff

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2006, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The area is great with shopping, the Vatican and great eating places with friendly staff.
reviews.title: The Best B&B

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2006, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: All in all a great place to stay in Rome. Great value,great people and a great location.
reviews.title: A great place to use as a base in Rome

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2006, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: My wife and I stayed here three nights during October, 2006. The room was clean and efficient. The breakfast was served to our room each moring and was outstanding. Best Vatican's location is excellent for touring Rome and Vatican City. It is one block from the Metro and in a residential neighberhood. The staff recommended some local restaurants that also were very good. Our experience at this B& B exceeded our expectations. The best value for your money in Rome.
reviews.title: Great B&B

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2006, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Gordy & Sally
reviews.title: Excellent Value

reviews.text: We stayed at the Best B&B (Vatican) for four nights in May. Best B&B was clean and comfortable with a good size bathroom and shower. Carlo was very helpful with itinerary planning and all of the staff we encountered were professional and pleasant. As other reviewers have indicated, the breakfast was excellent - by far the best we had in Italy with fresh fruit including sliced up strawberries, pastries, cereal, bacon and eggs, cheese, meat and choices of coffee, latte etc.One note - one of the four rooms (Room #4)is a little smaller than the other rooms and is a touch on the small side. We will definitely stay at the Best B & B next time we are in Rome.
reviews.title: Best B&B of our One Month Italian Vacation
GREAT Experience!
reviews.text: My new husband and I stayed in Best Bed and Breakfast near the Vatican, and it was a great experience. The rooms are just like they are online, and they are very spacious and clean. Has a big flat screen tv and dvd player in the room, and the hosts are very gracious and accomodating. I would stay here again in a minute. The breakfast they provide is amazing too...very good quality and lots of it!

reviews.title: Best B & B, best ever!
reviews.text: We loved the Best B&B, the room was exactly as pictured, large by european standards, clean and quiet. Carlo was absolutely brilliant, he showed us exactly how everything worked in the room and gave us the most wonderful tips on retaurants and sights of Rome. He made the difference between an ok stay in Rome and a completely memorable and wonderful stay.
The position was great with terrific restaurants on the doorstep (well a couple of doors away).
reviews.title: Quality
Wonderful Stay at the Best B&B
reviews.text: The breakfast was the best we had in three weeks away, served in the room on a trolley at exactly the time it was ordered. We would most definitely recommend this B&B to any one visiting Rome.

description: New charming B&B in the centre of Rome. The best for an unforgettable Roman Holiday. Few steps from the Vatican City and from the most important art and shopping itineraries.
